summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3951 for the improvement of 21st Avenue South, from Day Street to Ingersoll Place; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48167 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
